#include <stdio.h>
#define ll long long

int main()
{
	ll tc;
	scanf("%lld",&tc);
	while(tc--)
	{
		ll n;
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		if(n%2==1)
		{
			n--;
			n/=2;
			ll ans=n*n+n;
			printf("%lld\n",ans);
		}
		else
		{
			ll x=n/2;
			n-=2;
			n/=2;
			ll ansx=n*n+n;
			printf("%lld\n",ansx+x);
		}
	}
}
